skill.name: behaviors.skills.OperateAPlannedObject
skill.description: For an agent to move toward an planned object, create it and then, operate it. This skill is specific to 'plannedWork' and 'Object' classes. It uses the 'Create' skill with the 'plannedWork'. Because the 'Create' skill returns the created object (ontology.classes.Object) that realizes the concept of 'System', this skill uses the 'Operate' skill on this new created object.

parameter.name: plannedWork
parameter.description: The plannified work to create and operate.

argument.name: object
argument.description: The object created, and operated (a 'decontamination site' or a 'checkPoint' for instance).
